name: FTL-Cycle
description:
[Submission to 1-minute game jam #2] [THEME: 2-player]

Inspired by Tron. Control your light cycle (W/A/D or UP/LEFT/RIGHT arrow keys) and eliminate the RED enemies and your OPPONENT with your trail! Get the highest score you can in 60 seconds!

Credits to V-ktor and frankum on freesound.org for their free audio clips.

  • https://freesound.org/people/frankum/sounds/377540/
  • https://freesound.org/people/frankum/sounds/384306/
  • https://freesound.org/people/V-ktor/sounds/482993/
